courses.name: GREE 1 — Elementary Ancient Greek
courses.description: Instruction in the grammar of Attic Greek, together with readings from ancient authors, designed to prepare for the study of classical literature. The sequence begins in the fall quarter only.

courses.name: GREE 2 — Elementary Ancient Greek
courses.description: Instruction in the grammar of Attic Greek, together with readings from ancient authors, designed to prepare for the study of classical literature.
courses.rawRequirements: Requirements Prerequisite(s): GREE 1 , or permission of instructor
